title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: The file is dirtied but not changed, and code assist does not appear.
OB: When code assist is triggered, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes are made to the file. Additionally, the code assist functionality does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty when there are no changes made. The code assist functionality should still appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the code editor. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature. 
3. Notice that the file is marked as dirty even though no changes are made to the file. 
4. Verify that the code assist functionality does not appear.
